name: lsDateFormat
description:
Formats the date part of a date/time value in a locale-specific format.
 [mask - quicky]
 d,dd,ddd,dddd: Day of month / week
 m,mm,mmm,mmmm: Month
 y,yy,yyyy: Year
 gg: Period/era string
 short / medium / long / full

params.name: mask
params.description: A keyword or custom combination of components

params.name: locale
params.description: CF8+ Locale to use instead of the locale of the page when processing the function

coldfusion.notes: Member function is available in CF11+.

lucee.notes: Member function is available in Lucee4.5+.

examples.title: Tag Example
examples.description: lsDateFormat formats the date part of a date/time value using the locale convention.
examples.code: #locale# #lsDateFormat(now(), "mmm-dd-yyyy")# #lsDateFormat(now(), "mmmm d, yyyy")# #lsDateFormat(now(), "mm/dd/yyyy")# #lsDateFormat(now(), "d-mmm-yyyy")# #lsDateFormat(now(), "ddd, mmmm dd, yyyy")# #lsDateFormat(now(), "d/m/yy")# #lsDateFormat(now())#
